title: breakfast
descr:
The most important meal of the day will be available from 8:00a to 8:45a. Be sure to arrive in enough time to grab your breakfast so your stomach isn't growling all day.

Menu includes delicous bagels and Ethiopian coffee!

title: main session 1
descr:
Say Yes to God

Head on into the main auditorium for the first session


Pastor Ryan Rodeman will deliver this important first session. As God reaches us, He has us. He is Lord. We say yes. The adventure of the pathway with Him awaits!

title: break
descr:
Have you submitted a Make My Day' yet?.


Find some snaks in the lobby and meet a new friend! We'll see you in 15

title: workshops
descr:
Find your workshop room and be prepared for a smaller, more intimate setting with our speakers.

Workshops during this time are

  • Mitch & Susan Sintic
  • John Reaser
  • Bena

title: main session 2
descr:
Hungry? Be sure to grab a snack before returning to the main auditorium for this session.

Pastor Joe will speak on Innovation. Collaboration. Integration.

We are the ministry of today. There is no waiting. We are better together - partnership and cooperation.

title: lunch
descr:
Grab some lunch from the hot dog bar!

Build your own dog and get ready for the afternoon sessions.

title: workshops
descr:
Workshops during this time are

  • Mitch & Susan Sintic
  • John Reaser
  • Bena

Last chance to submit a Make My Day!

title: closing session
descr:
It's so sad, but even good things must come to an end.

This is our last session for the conference. Pastor Joe will share about The Cost of Saying Yes. Sacrifice and suffering: living in the power of His resurrection.
